principles: Fusion: Glassmorphism meets Tropical Business (Suriname context)
Depth: Layered interfaces using z-index and blur, not just flat cards
Clarity: Data is dense but breathable

usage_rules: Headings (H1-H3): Outfit. Weight: 600/700. Tracking: -0.02em. Use for page titles and major section headers.
Subheadings (H4-H6): Plus Jakarta Sans. Weight: 600. Tracking: normal. Use for card titles.
Body: Plus Jakarta Sans. Weight: 400/500. Leading: relaxed.
Data/Numbers: Plus Jakarta Sans (tabular-nums) or JetBrains Mono for financial data.

primary.description: The core brand color. Use for primary actions, active states, and key highlights.

sidebar.classes: bg-white/80 dark:bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-xl border-r border-white/20 dark:border-white/10 shadow-[4px_0_24px_rgba(0,0,0,0.02)]

header.classes: bg-white/70 dark:bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-white/20 dark:border-white/10 sticky top-0 z-50

cards.classes: bg-white/60 dark:bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-lg border border-white/40 dark:border-white/10 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1

modals.classes: bg-white/90 dark:bg-[#0a120e]/90 backdrop-blur-2xl border border-white/20 shadow-2xl

dashboard_grid.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6 p-6
dashboard_grid.rules: Use col-span-2 for main charts, col-span-1 for summary cards. Maintain strict alignment.

data_tables.header_classes: text-xs uppercase tracking-wider text-muted-foreground font-semibold bg-muted/30 p-4 text-left

buttons.primary: bg-[#0caf60] hover:bg-[#099954] text-white shadow-lg shadow-[#0caf60]/20 rounded-lg px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white dark:bg-white/10 border border-border hover:bg-muted text-foreground rounded-lg px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-primary/10 text-primary hover:text-primary/80 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 transition-all

inputs.base: bg-white/50 dark:bg-black/20 border border-border focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-lg px-4 py-2.5 outline-none transition-all backdrop-blur-sm

status_badges.base: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium ring-1 ring-inset

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px for elegance, 2px for active states

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic gradients. Use the 'Crystal Forest' palette.
Ensure all interactive elements have `data-testid` attributes.
Files are `.js` (React), not `.tsx`. Adapt code accordingly.
Dark mode is toggled via class 'dark' on the HTML element.
Always prioritize mobile responsiveness. Use `hidden md:block` for non-essential desktop elements.
For charts, use `recharts` with custom tooltips styled like glass cards.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building the frontend for Facturatie N.V. Follow these guidelines strictly. Start by updating the Tailwind config to match the colors and border radius. Then, refactor the App.css to implement the glassmorphism utility classes. Finally, build the components and pages using the specified layout strategies. Remember: The user wants a 'Professional SaaS' look, so keep animations smooth (0.2s - 0.3s) and avoid excessive bouncing.
